name: Soccer (itch) (SteliosKrom)
description:
This game is unlimited and the purpose of the game is to counter enemy balls getting to your goal, enemy waves are increasing every time they are getting to your goal. You control a ball and you don't have to let enemy balls come through to your goal,  also make sure to use some of the powerups. If it possible try to hit enemy balls in order to push them back and try shooting them back to their goal.

Controls 

W - Move forward

A - Move left 

D - Move Right 

S - Move down 

Space - Boost up
